sub_title: Subsurface Technology Strategy Advisor/Senior Geoscientist/Business Opportunity Manager
summary:
Over 15 years Upstre­am experience includ­ing Exploration, Dev­elopment, Geoscience, Assets Governance, Commercial, Corpora­te Strategy and Port­folio. I am an int­ernationally experie­nced, versatile and commercially minded person with an exper­ience in leading sub­surface projects and integrating across diverse teams to suc­cessfully deliver la­rge scale full lifec­ycle hydrocarbon opp­ortunities. Skilled in project managem­ent, as BOM delivered multidisciplinary capital ($250M SS) project via all ORS phases (Identify to FID). Integrator with a track record for collaborating effect­ively in diverse and multi-cultural envi­ronments, building rapport, fostering, and maintaining rel­ationships with JV partners, and progres­sing growth opportun­ities, even in chall­enging geopolitical contexts. A passion for team building and driving effectiven­ess through cultivat­ing collaborative re­lationships, establi­shing trust and gent­le influencing.

Recognized as strong geoscientist with focus on petroleum sy­stem analyzes. Having PhD in Petroleum geology and geochemis­try applied knowledge in wide variety of petroleum basins and settings across the globe from Offsh­ore to Onshore Uncon­ventionals, from bas­in scale to prospect level. Exhibiting a very strong learner mindset.

education.field_of_study: Marine and petroleum geology and geochemistry

school.name: NWO-NIOZ Royal Netherlands Institute for Sea Research

profile_positions.description:
Subsurface geological governance of existing and future production in Russia assets, supporting JVs in proper planning of drilling sequences, cost, safety and subsurface result performance. 
Technical expertise on the static models and uncertainty evaluation.
Technical Lead for Tight Reservoir development 
Business opportunity manager (BOM) for growth project in JV from governance side: including exploration, appraisal, full field development and infrastructure decisions (with total budget over $0.5bil)
profile_positions.title: Bussines Opportunity Manager/Geology and Geophysics Lead Russia

profile_positions.description:
Broadening in Commercial: full-fill undestanding of exploration and operational project management. Economic evaluation analysis and objective decision support (in joint venture governance and investment decision-making) for a particular asset in Russia and/or new business and exploration projects:
- Economic evaluation for specific assets, projects or investment opportunities, including modeling the economics of investments. 
- Analyse uncertainty and risk in investment value.
- Determine the value of assets, opportunities and businesses as required as part of the opportunity realisation, asset management and business planning processes.
- Providing support for Shell “JV shareholder representative” in terms of economic information and analysis.
- Calculate economic cut off for reserves, and formally report expectation reserves in conjunction with the JV reserves co-ordinator.
- Provide economics input for strategy development.
profile_positions.title: Economist

profile_positions.description:
Growth Opportunity in Russia and Europe 

Focused on the technical and commercial assessments of Russia (Volga-Ural, Timan Pechora, North Caucasus, West Siberia) and Europe (Low Saxony Basin). 
Produced high quality regional and sub-regional play based exploration evaluations and licence opportunity evaluation for various projects. The scope of a given project included geology, basin models, structural geology, seismic interpretation, hydrocarbon charge interpretation, petrophysical analysis and fluid properties.  
Technical team lead /subsurface coordinator for light tight oil potential of Volga Ural and Timan Pechora basin (Devonian source rocks). 
Project lead for JV with Russian petroleum Company: assessment of shale gas and light tight oil of Bazhenov unconventional play (Jurassic source rocks). Technical lead of project and technical alignment with russian partner. 
Project Management of JV and organizing partner meetings and peer reviews.

Completed Play Based Evaluation of shale gas and light tight oil potential of Posidonia play (Low Saxony Basin).
profile_positions.title: Exploration Geoscientist in Unconventional

profile_positions.description:
Growth opportunity in Russia and International: conventional and unconventional plays. Company growth strategy. Petroleum analyst, source rocks evaluation, basin assessment, resource and geological risk evaluation.

- Undertook geological evaluations of new areas (basins, licence blocks & prospects) resource calculation, and geological risk analyses. 
- Specialist in petroleum system analyses and basin modeling (Temis/Beicip FranLab).
- Participated in the preparation of company growth strategy reviews.  
- Completed multiple data rooms visit and assessments as a petroleum analyst. Projects covered assessments in Venezuela, Ecuador, China, Turkmenistan, Kazakhstan, Indonesia, Iceland, Ireland &Turkey.

Unconventional resource analyses included:
1 Bitumen field exploration (joint work with research institute).  Organised field-trip to East Siberia.
2 Assessments of the Bazhenov Source Rock (West Siberia Team).
3 Organised and led long term gas hydrate projects both offshore and onshore in Russia, which involved detailed mapping and resource evaluation. 

Basin Modeling Team Lead:
- Delivered assessments and analyses of petroleum system of offshore Sakhalin, East Siberia, West Siberia, Caspian sea (Russia and Kazakhstan sector, Turkmen shelf), Black sea (Russian sector), Azov Sea (Russian sector) and Arctic basins (in Barents, Kara and Chukchi Seas).
- Responsible for the assurance of core studies from exploration wells and reviewed geochemical reports. Prepared core and analytic programs for unconventional and conventional plays.
profile_positions.title: Senior Exploration Geologist

profile_positions.description:
R&D and Growth opportunity: working as Exploration Geologist & Basin Modeller.  

Successfully undertook play based evaluation and technical risk assessment for growth opportunity in Russia.
Completed basin modeling projects (offshore Kamchatka, Sakhalin & Black Sea).
Finalised a number of Geochemical evaluations.
profile_positions.title: Lead Exploration Geologist

profile_positions.description: Working on Laboratory of Stable isotope (IRMS Thermo-Finigan); preparing and analysing samples of Natural Gas, Water, Crude oils and fractions in order to evaluate stable C, O, H, N isotopes. Results interpretation and reporting.
